name: Astrolo-fi
description:
Description:

Just a chill game where you can collect stars by jumping from constellation to constellation thanks to your inertia.

PS: Music is not really lo-fi it's sovietwave for those who wonder.

There no victory/lose condition cause we want it to be chill but you can collect stars.

Made for Ludum Dare 47.

Controls:

Press space or A to jump

Credits:

-Blix
-Ravengar

Music royalty free:

-Буран Воскрешение (PPK cover)
-Импульс-80 Импульс-80 - Небосвод
-Astronaut Ainex3 Удары синтезаторов – Весна

Font: kremlin by Vic Fieger
